title: Darkfire
description: A secret guild. Four irresistible guardians. A sinister evil out to get her.   Luna is caught between two worlds: dark and light. Both want her powers for different reasons. Together with her four guardians, she must battle for her freedom, get vengeance for her parents' murders and stop a dark forces from stealing a powerful book that will unleash dark forces into the world.  Darkfire is Book 1 in the Guild of Shadows Series and is a slow-burn reverse harem.
author: Skyler Andra
